item.title: Introduction to Linux
item.description: Introdution to linux Linux is an operating system (much like windows is an operating system). Linux started of as one nerd’s hobby but quickly grew in fame. Linux is free, it’s source code is freely avaiable, and it is created, developed and used by a large communi https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PTaL1s3YJPY http://rik.smith-unna.com/command_line_bootcamp/?id=1d0zyezf844 Excercises:
